Hi,

ve and have been able to configure everything except for the following prop=
erty in 
<bean id=3D"warcWriter" class=3D"org.archive.modules.writer.Mirror=
WriterProcessor">
<property name=3D"skipIdenticalDigests"> 
       <propert=
y name=3D"shouldProcessRule">
           <bean class=3D"org.archive.modules=
.deciderules.recrawl.IdenticalDigestDecideRule">
                <property =
name=3D"decision" value=3D"REJECT"/>
           </bean>
       </property>
=
</property>
</bean>

as this always throws up error saying wrong . If any o=
ne could point out as to what am i doing wrong here , it would be of great =
